title: Six Deals You Need To Know About In Australia Today
text:
Image: Gizmodo

G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: 40% off MSI gaming laptops, cheap Samsung Galaxy S10e plans, 66% off kitchen knives at Catch and more!

1. Knife clearance: Catch is having a sale on knives and other kitchenware, with free shipping. Save up to 66% off! Click here.

2. 40% off MSI gaming laptops: MSI is having a laptop sale on its official Amazon store with up to 40% off select models. That's a saving of up to $3200! (There are cheaper models available too.) Click here!

3. 25% off Razer laptops: Amazon Australia has knocked up to 25% off a range of Razer Blade gaming laptops. This works out to a saving of over $600 on some models. Click here!

4. Cheap S10e with free Galaxy Buds: Optus has knocked its Samsung Galaxy S10e 30GB plan down to $59 a month. (For comparison, Optus was previously selling the S10e for $75 per month with just with 4GB of data.) If you sign-up to the plan before November 25, you also get a free pair of Galaxy Buds valued at $249. Bargain! Here are the inclusions:

5. 20% off at The Good Guys: The Good Guys is having another 20% off sale via its eBay store. There are stacks of tech deals on offer including TVs, laptops, cameras and smartphones. To get the discount, use the code 'PGGUY' at checkout. Click here!

6. $10 off $100 spends at eBay: If you have your eye an eBay item over $100, you can currently score an extra $10 off. To get the deal, use the discount code 'PETAL'. You can also score $50 off if you spend $500 or more. Click here!

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
description: G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: 40% off MSI gaming laptops, cheap Samsung Galaxy S10e plans, 66% off kitchen knives at Catch and more!...
